alert.note: Alert for Santa Barbara County Interior Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued February 24 at 4:01AM PST until February 25 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST SATURDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 4 AM PST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Heavy snow, wind gusts up to 65 mph, and near zero visibility. Total snow accumulations from up to 6 inches of snow down to 2000 feet to 1 to 3 feet above 4000 feet. Isolated snow amounts to 5 feet on favored peaks. * WHERE...Santa Barbara County Interior Mountains. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Potential for road closures. Some mountains roadways may be impassable for an extended period of time. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions from CalTrans are available by calling 1 800 4 2 7 7 6 2 3.
